nodes.text: Durelium was a substance that was profitable for smugglers. The smuggler Platt Okeefe recommended it as a good cargo to turn a profit in the pirate Maz Kanata's Smuggler's Guide, along with meleenium, hyperbarides and Corusca stones.
Durelium was first mentioned in the 2018 canon reference book Star Wars: Smuggler's Guide, written by Daniel Wallace.
